name: The Backrooms (itch) (Mikebrolo)
description:
Welcome to the backrooms, walls filled with stained yellow wallpaper, moist carpet, and the constant noise of the fluorescent lighting. Find your way out of each level by following a specific noise. Will you survive?

NOTE:: THIS IS VERY EARLY IN DEVELOPMENT; ISSUES ARE PRONE TO APPEAR

Instructions to install: 

        -install file

       -extract file

       -run 'Backrooms.exe'
